history.content:
Hi All, 
 
We hope you and your loved ones are doing well.
Please note that the deadline for submitting your ACCEL SCHOLARS PROGRAM application has been extended. If you have not already submitted an application, please consider doing so by Sunday, April 12th.
 Apply Now! 
 
The Accel Scholars Program provides an unparalleled mentorship opportunity for students looking to pursue a career in technology (engineering, product management, entrepreneurship, etc).
 
The curriculum covers topics not generally taught in class — how to become a great engineer, how to grow your career, how to build your professional network, how to raise money and start a company, and so on. Further, we offer concierge-level help as you navigate applying to companies and getting your career off to the right start.
 
Accel Scholars will be given unique, direct access to leaders from Silicon Valley, including founders, engineering leaders, etc, all the while building close connectivity with their cohort and former cohorts of Accel Scholars. Graduates from the program include engineers and product managers at companies such as Airbnb, Stripe, Cruise, Databricks, Dropbox, Figma, Slack, VSCo, and more.
 
Stay safe and healthy,

--

Yoshira Méndes  
External Relations Program Coordinator
Dept. of Electrical Engineering & Computer Sciences
Phone: (510) 643-6850
Twitter: @Berkeley_EECS
http://student-postings.eecs.berkeley.edu
history.subject: Accel Scolars Program - Deadline Extended
